data.event: Vanderburgh, Ind., County prosecutors last week charged George R, Chesnut with robbing Evansville Federal Credit Union on Dec. 5.
The warrant was filed Tuesday in Madison County for Chesnut's home in the 2400 block of Gillis Street in Alton.

event.title: matched the description of a suspect in the Dec. 5

data.event: Chesnut matched the description of a suspect in the Dec. 5 bank robbery in which a man wearing a dark hooded jacket entered the bank and showed the teller the butt of his gun and demanded cash.
On March 7, FBI agents searched Chesnut's home.
